content: this legal text summarizes a court judgment in ljubljana regarding a divorce case the case involved the division of property between two exspouses the court ruled that each exspouse would receive half of a fridge which was considered a relevant item in the lawsuit the total value of the fridge was 20000 eur the court also dismissed the plaintiffs claim for other items in the coowned property but awarded them a monetary claim of eur 5000 for the coowned property and housing costs the defendant was ordered to pay the plaintiff eur 1000000 for their share of the joint property the court also dismissed the plaintiffs claim for reimbursement of legal costs and ordered the plaintiff to reimburse the defendants legal costs the text also explains the process of appealing a decision in a legal case and provides information on the time limit and requirements for lodging an appeal
